fields.name: Protect:
fields.value: Target a player. You will add half your defense power to theirs. You will randomly attack one of your target's visitors, prioritizing attackers (if your attack is successful, the visitor is also roleblocked). If your standard deviation was less than 27.50%, you will also learn one player your target can win with.

fields.name: Meat Shield (Locked, Passive):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Protect will also transfer half of your defense power to your target, for a total of 100% of your defense power being added (and your own reduced by 50%).

fields.name: Work Out (Passive):
fields.value: Each night, choose whether to boost your attack or defense power by 0.4x for that night.
